name: Grasshoppers!
description:
Grasshoppers! is a retro-style 2D arcade game in which you play as Bobby, who is on a mission to quickly get pumpkins for his hometown's Halloween festival. Each level Bobby must get either happy or sad pumpkins in a certain amount of time, and all of that while avoiding getting bitten by some annoying grasshoppers. But, on the other hand, Bobby can count on some special pumpkins to give him benefits throughout his mission.

> Main features/characteristics:
- Simple and short gameplay;
- Three lives per run;
- Score attack;
- Permanent and temporary powerups (special pumpkins)
-> Permanent: acceleration, deceleration and speed;
-> Temporary: invincibility against grasshoppers.
- Levels with progressively increasing difficulty;
- Hi-Score autosave.
